# Welcome to the #day21 website

Fertility can return as little as 21 days after delivery.
<br>
The World Health Organisation recommends an interpregnancy interval of 2 years.
<br>
Yet 1 in 13 mothers fall pregnant within 12 months of delivery. 
<br>
Know your options. Make informed choices.
